pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains definitions for the app-text/pandoc data structure, which is used by pandoc to represent structured documents. These definitions used to live in the pandoc package, but starting with pandoc 1.7, they have been split off, so that other packages can use them without drawing in all of pandoc's dependencies, and pandoc itself can depend on packages (like dev-haskell/citeproc-hs) that use them.
